name: Air Raid Over Britain
description:
Early Preview: Air Raid Over Britain is currently in Early Preview. This is a early look at our development of a hands-off VR experience. Note: this game is still in production and does not necessarily reflect the final product.

Air Raid Over Britain is a short VR experience / technical demo that places you in the heart of a small English town during a nighttime bombing raid by German HE-111s. In this VR experience, you'll experience the sights and sounds of WWII Air Raids as experienced from a ground-level perspective. Using era-specific details and sounds, you'll gain an unique perspective on the terrors of war, particularly during "The Blitz" between 1940-1941.
